SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model_view

Class DeckView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.model_view.DeckView
public class DeckView extends Object
Client's copy of model decks, contains only cards the player can use at the moment.

    • getNumFaceUpCards

      public int getNumFaceUpCards(CardType cardType)
      Getter method for the number of face up cards of a certain type. The number can be different from 2 when a deck is almost empty.
      Parameters:
      cardType - card type
      Returns:
      number of face up cards of a given type
